page.title: 15HOUSING C. CROOKHAM
page.content: {ROADS }We studied{20}roads in the residential area of Church Crookham . There are {366},detached houses, {229},Bungolows,{296},Semi detached houses, and no noticeable blocks of flats.We counted {5 }Pubs, and{3 churches There are quite a number of very big, expensive houses, and some fine trees and big gardens.{ LINKWAY}. Velmead school studied the road called Linkway.It is 404 metres long,mainly residential, with a shopping area at one end.On{Tuesday,July 2.for 2.00pm {to 3.00 pm}we found {48 houses mostly {semi-detached bungalows},{20 vehicles, {37 }adults and {18}teenagers.. {HALLS.}Peter Driver sports hall, Holy Trinty (Catholic) church hall ,Christ Church Vestry church hall,and Ewshot VIllage Hall and the Memorial Hall, all used widely(see page 20). THere are 3 private old peoples' homes
